column3: Latest;Kampong Chhnang Province: A woman with a rare medical condition has been searching for Khmer practitioners for around 5 years
column4: but her illness remains unsolved. Her friends and family are now appealing for help.------A Facebook account
column5: claiming to be a friend of the girl
column7: describing the condition of the woman
column8: whose abdomen was unusually large but not pregnant.------The Facebook account holder has also appealed to anyone with knowledge of this medical condition
column9: or those who would like to contribute financial aid to her to phone: 087 393325 or speak to her directly on 010 2155 9855. ------https://kbn.news/archives/116057
